abstract: The death of Dick Clark on Wednesday prompted an outpouring of memories from generations of viewers and fans, including Paul Anka, Clive Davis and Ryan Seacrest.
snippet: The death of Dick Clark on Wednesday prompted an outpouring of memories from generations of viewers and fans, including Paul Anka, Clive Davis and Ryan Seacrest.

headline.main: Reactions to Death of Dick Clark, New Year’s Eve Icon

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Bill Carter
